import"/Users/ananyaanand/Desktop/bruinbot/src/App.css";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,Row,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import{ArrowRightCircle}from"react-bootstrap-icons";import headerImg from"../assets/headerImg.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Banner=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[loopNum,setLoopNum]=useState(0);const[isDeleting,setIsDeleting]=useState(false);const toRotate=["8 AMs.","Friday Classes.","Stress."];const[text,setText]=useState("");const period=2000;const[delta,setDelta]=useState(300-Math.random()*100);// determine how fast letter comes after 
useEffect(()=>{let ticker=setInterval(()=>{tick();},delta);return()=>{clearInterval(ticker);};},[text]);const tick=()=>{let i=loopNum%toRotate.length;let fullText=toRotate[i];let updatedText=isDeleting?fullText.substring(0,text.length-1):fullText.substring(0,text.length+1);setText(updatedText);if(isDeleting){setDelta(prevDelta=>prevDelta/2);}if(!isDeleting&&updatedText===fullText){setIsDeleting(true);setDelta(period);}else if(isDeleting&&updatedText===''){setIsDeleting(false);setLoopNum(loopNum+1);setDelta(500);}};const handleClick=()=>{navigate('/Form');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"banner",id:"home",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"align-items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"banner-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{xs:12,md:6,xl:7,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Say No to ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"wrap",children:text})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:handleClick,children:["Get Started with BruinBot!",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowRightCircle,{size:30})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:12,md:6,xl:5,className:"banner-img-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:headerImg,alt:"Bear"})})]})})});};
